mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventoryies( members_id, items_id, price, quantity) value( #{membersId}, #{itemsId}, #{price}, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT items_id, SUM(quantity) AS quantity, SUM(quantity*price)/SUM(quantity) AS average_price FROM inventories WHERE members_id = #{memberes_id} AND items_id = #{itemsId} GROUP BY items_id
